name: Endless Space Road
description:
This is endless Space road game. Get as many  gems as you can to set highest score and try not to get hit by obstacles on the road.

The character will move side to side automatically.  It can be stopped by having  KEY_S  pressed. You will be able to use your special weapon when you get the gloves.

Controller

 to stop the player  keep pressed   ->     KEY  S 

when you have the gloves  press->     KEY D

credits:

ache games,  blender, godot,  krita ,  lmms,  freesound

Other characters will be available after jam is over.
